resources.string:
The goal of sudoku is to fill each row, column, and 3x3 box with the numbers 1-9.

If you want to play sudoku, click "New game", select your preferred difficulty, and press "Start".

To fill an empty square, press the square and fill in the number you want.

If you are unsure of a number, or only want to decorate the board, select a square and then press your preferred colour from below the board.

When you have filled in all the numbers, press "check" to verify your solution.

To return to the main menu, press the 'back' button on your device twice



To create your own sudoku, press "New board".

Fill in the squares necessary for your sudoku in the same way as filling in numbers when solving.

Select the difficulty of your sudoku from the dropdown on the left, and press save.



To return to the main menu, press the 'back' button on your device.
